logger.message: #["[" ++ (now() >> "PST") as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss"} ++ "], " ++ "###SyncJobId=" ++ attributes.properties.userProperties.transaction_header.syncJobId ++ "###, TransactionId=" ++ attributes.properties.userProperties.transaction_header.transactionId ++ "\nCareBenefitVerificationRequest Creation Process API Started Successfully"]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload.patients map (val,ind) ->{ "FIRST_NAME" : val.patient_details.first_name, "LAST_NAME" : val.patient_details.last_name, "DATE_OF_BIRTH" : val.patient_details.date_of_birth, "GENDER" : val.patient_details.gender, "INSURANCE_PROVIDER_NAME" : val.insurance_information.insurance_provider_name, "POLICY_NUMBER" : val.insurance_information.policy_number, "GROUP_NUMBER" : val.insurance_information.group_number, "SUBSCRIBER_ID" : val.insurance_information.subscriber_id, "NATIONAL_PROVIDER_IDENTIFIER" : val.provider_information.npi, "PROVIDER_NAME" : val.provider_information.provider_name, "SERVICE_TYPE" : val.service_details.service_type, "SERVICE_DATE" : val.service_details.service_date, "DIAGNOSIS_CODE" : val.service_details.diagnosis_code, "PROCEDURE_CODE" : val.service_details.procedure_code, "PROCESS_FLAG" :"IP", "PROCESS_MESSAGE" : "", }

logger.message: #["[" ++ (now() >> "PST") as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss"} ++ "], " ++ "###SyncJobId=" ++ attributes.properties.userProperties.transaction_header.syncJobId ++ "###, TransactionId=" ++ attributes.properties.userProperties.transaction_header.transactionId ++ "\nCareBenefitVerificationRequest Archival Into Snowflake Ended Successfully"]

#["[" ++ (now() >> "PST") as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss"} ++ "], " ++ "###SyncJobId=" ++ attributes.properties.userProperties.transaction_header.syncJobId ++ "###, TransactionId=" ++ attributes.properties.userProperties.transaction_header.transactionId ++ "\nCareBenefitVerificationRequest Creation Process API Ended Successfully"]
